entities.description: Use of prescription stimulants to get over or avoid symptoms related to withdrawal in the past 12 months.
Symptoms experienced due to withdrawal from a substance like prescription stimulants, cocaine, or methamphetamine.
Use of cocaine to get over or avoid withdrawal symptoms in the past 12 months.
Use of methamphetamine to get over or avoid withdrawal symptoms in the past 12 months.

relationships.description: Indicates whether the respondent used prescription stimulants in the past 12 months.
Defines the symptoms experienced by the respondent due to substance withdrawal.
Indicates whether the respondent used cocaine to get over or avoid withdrawal symptoms in the past 12 months.
Indicates whether the respondent used methamphetamine to get over or avoid withdrawal symptoms in the past 12 months.
